William Diseret ke Badan Kehormatan Gegara Bongkar Rancangan Anggaran
05 Nov 2019, 22:04 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Anggota DPRD DKI dari Fraksi PSI, William Aditya Sarana, dilaporkan ke Badan Kehormatan (BK) DPRD oleh warga Jakarta bernama Sugiyanto. William dilaporkan karena membongkar rancangan anggaran Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta.
Sebagaimana diketahui, William adalah sosok yang mengungkap usulan anggaran kontroversial di Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta, yakni usulan anggaran lem Aibon senilai Rp 82,8 miliar. William bahkan menggelar konferensi pers untuk mengkritik usulan anggaran itu. Langkahnya tersebut diduga Sugiyanto melanggar kode etik.
"Bapak William Aditya Sarana diduga melanggar kode etik karena mengunggah rencana KUA-PPAS (Kebijakan Umum Anggaran-Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara) ke media sosial. Sedangkan rencana KUA-PPAS itu belum dibahas di forum DPRD atau masih dalam pembahasan dalam rapat-rapat komisi atau rapat Banggar DKI Jakarta," ucap Sugiyanto saat dalam keterangannya, Senin (4/11) kemarin.
KUA-PPAS yang disebut Sugiyanto adalah cikal bakal APBD. Langkah William menggelar jumpa pers soal KUA-PPAS juga dinilainya menimbulkan persepsi negatif di publik terhadap DPRD DKI dan Gubernur Anies Baswedan.
"Gubernur Anies Baswedan seolah-olah tidak transparan dan tidak becus dalam mengontrol usulan anggaran KUA-PPAS. Padahal Gubernur Anies Baswedan telah melakukan kontrol dan pengarahan," kata Sugiyanto.

William dragged to the State Honorary Board Unloading the Budget Draft
05 Nov 2019, 22:04 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - DKI DPRD member from the PSI Faction, William Aditya Sarana, was reported to the DPRD Honorary Board (BK) by a Jakarta resident named Sugiyanto. William was reported for dismantling the draft budget of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government.
As is known, William is the figure who revealed the controversial budget proposal in the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government, namely the Aibon glue proposal worth Rp.82.8 billion. William even held a press conference to criticize the budget proposal. The move was allegedly Sugiyanto violated the code of ethics.
"Mr. William Aditya Sarana is suspected of violating the code of ethics because he uploaded the KUA-PPAS (Provisional Ceiling Budget Priority Policy) to social media. While the KUA-PPAS plan has not been discussed in the DPRD forum or is still being discussed in commission meetings or Jakarta Banggar meeting, "said Sugiyanto when in his statement on Monday (4/11) yesterday.
KUA-PPAS called Sugiyanto is the forerunner of the regional budget. William's step in holding a press conference about KUA-PPAS was also considered to have caused negative public perception of the DKI DPRD and Governor Anies Baswedan.
"Governor Anies Baswedan seems to be not transparent and incompetent in controlling the KUA-PPAS budget proposal. Whereas Governor Anies Baswedan has exercised control and direction," said Sugiyanto.
